name: Calendar 2014
description: What's the average shoe size of One Direction? Do mice dream in colour? Why are coins the size they are? These things the Ben Rowe 2014 Calendar cannot tell you, but it can tell you that there is only one Friday 13th next year! This unique gathering of next year's days, weeks and months can be yours to own...forever. This is an ideal gift for the calendar fanatic in your family or as a last minute present when your local garage is closed. This calendar contains 12 classic images from benrowe.co.uk printed on quality stock to hang on your wall or a vertical surface of your choice. The calendar features both colour and black & white illustrations and measures 21cm x 42cm when opened. This is a super strictly limited edition run, folks...so grab one while you can! Once they're gone, they're gone! **There are only a handful left, folks!!** Calendar is posted 1st Class (UK), Airmail (Rest of the Planet) in a stiff cardboard mailer. This calendar is also being sold at www.benrowe.co.uk, where further images can also be seen. If you have any questions about the calendar, please feel free to contact me. Thank you for looking! All images are Â© Ben Rowe.

name: Pedestrian badge
description:
Do you like badges?

Are you/ have you ever been / do you know / have you known a pedestrian?

Two questions that, even if you haven't answered 'yes' to, doesn't exclude you from buying this badge that is anything but pedestrian!

This lovely blue badge featuring the world famous walking man is ideal for your bag strap or your pinable surface of choice.

Each badge comes in its own zip seal bag and is posted First Class (UK) or Airmail (World) in a small padded envelope.

Designed in a road rage free environment.

name: 'Washtower' zine
description:
'Washtower' is my first foray into the world of zines which debuted at the London Zine Symposium in 2010.

This A5, 20 page, part hand-coloured publication features a collection of classic material from my website with a few new tweaks.

If you're a fan of the surreal, wordplay and washing machines, then this is the zine for you!

**Please note - I'm down to the last few of these. Please contact me for availability. Thank you!**

name: 'Emo' and 'Plug Socket' badge set
description:
2 x 25mm pin badge set based on my 'Emo' and 'Plug Socket Single (UK)' illustrations from my website (also available as art prints).

Badges sold as a pair and come packaged in their own plastic zip-seal bag.

name: John Peel badges
description:
5 John Peel inspired badges made to coincide with Glasgow Podcart's 'Eclectic Peel' exhibition in Glasgow, December 2010.

The designs are:

'Peel Tape'
'Peel DJ'
'Peel Record Player'
'Peel Pose'
'Right Time, Right Place, Wrong Speed'

Badges are 50p each and come in their own mini John Peel plastic zip-seal bag! If you are ordering more than one badge and would like them in separate bags, then please let me know. Otherwise, I'll package them in to one bag (where possible).

For further info on the exhibition, visit:
http://www.benrowe.co.uk/exhibitions_eclectic_peel.htm

options.name: Right Time, Right Place, Wrong Speed pin badge
